venn.graph
Class HistErrPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  venn.graph.PlotPanel
                      venn.graph.HistErrPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class HistErrPanel
extends PlotPanel

Display the histogram data. Subclass of PlotPanel that provides the option of drawing error bars.

See Also:
Serialized Form
